local_intent: Verify handle is visible, set wrist and pre-shape gripper, compute grasp pose for pull on door handle, and confirm pose stored.
assumptions: Handle is observable in current frame
Grasp pose computation stores result under 'door_grasp'
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence around ComputeGraspPose: ensure visibility, set yaw=90, open gripper, compute pull grasp on door handle, then verify pose exists before proceeding.
